title: If you were Justin Bieber, what would you do? - Quora

response.answer_text: If I have to be Justin Bieber, I’ll have to be everything including his mind and body. So, it is useless to even think that I would do anything other than what he did, is doing or will do?! I will be MYSELF even if I am Justin Bieber… is a routinely misconstrued premise!
